home.title: Enhance
home.content: Our website streamlines the differentiation between O and 0, as well as between I and L, for a smoother reading experience

iorl.title: Is it an
iorl.content: Difficult to differentiate between I and L ? No problem, we have the solution! Just paste the text in the box below, and we'll tell you if it's an I or a L.

Ooro.title: Is it an
Ooro.content: Difficult to differentiate between O and 0 ? No problem, we have the solution! Just paste the text in the box below, and we'll tell you if it's an O or a 0.
